Angle3D

class SimpleAssetCache<T>

package org.angle3d.asset.cache

implements AssetCache<T>

SimpleAssetCache is an asset cache that caches assets without any automatic removal policy. The user is expected to manually call {#deleteFromCache(org.angle3d.asset.AssetKey) } to delete any assets.

Constructor

new ()

Methods

addToCache (key:AssetKey, obj:T):Void

clearCache ():Void

deleteFromCache (key:AssetKey):Bool

getFromCache (key:AssetKey):T

notifyNoAssetClone ():Void

registerAssetClone (key:AssetKey, clone:T):Void
